ai-patthana23.21:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.21:1.1_0: Not by results of the result, no skillful qualities arise.
ai-patthana23.21:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.21:2.1_0: Not by results of the result, no unskillful qualities arises in him.
ai-patthana23.21:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.21:3.1_0: nor does the current rulers arise in someone who isn’t corrupted, or who has not done bad things.
ai-patthana23.21:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana23.21:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
